singleItemContent: p>Do you like to eat sweets?
p>Do you like sweets more or less now compared with when you were child?
p>Have you ever tried to make sweets or cakes?
p>Do you eat cakes or sweets after the meal?
p>Is there any sweet food in your country?
p>Describe a city that you think is interesting.
p>What the city is famous for?
p>And explain how you feel about it?
p>What advantages can tourism bring to a city?
p>Why do some young people like to live in cities?
p>Do most elderly people live in the city or in the countryside?
p>Do you think well-developed tourism will have negative effects on local people?
